dublin_core.dcvalue: The multimedia teleconsultation service ENDOTEL launches in May 2000 with its asynchronous component In the initial phase three hospitals and four general practitioners use the service to consult a specialist in the domain of gastroenterology and endoscopy By validation of the patient information i e videos voice clips still images and text the experts can decide the further proceeding for example whether a patient shall be transported to a specialized hospital or not cost saving We report about the experiences during the initiation and the first months of operation
Studies in health technology and informatics
The teleconsultation service ENDOTEL. Implementation and first experiences.
